channel.title: Help Me Please
channel.description:
ok on my server a statement will come out
it will say [news]: whatever...
like a yell. but it shows up every like 1 min and i wanna change what it says.
how do i do this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2008, 10:02:01 pm[/size][hr]ffs someone help me

item.title: Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

im guna go ahead and asume ur using my source… SilabGarza v6

under the files look for something called laghandler.java

in there near hte top theres something saying “[NEWS] Its almost Aguust 5th, Gir’s B-day!”

change that duh

or if thats not it, ur prob using a gud source, probz under a file called ServerCP

if that duzn’t work, just search every file for wat its saying :]
